snippet: Representative Chris Van Hollen filed suit in Federal District Court to force the Internal Revenue Service to block tax-exempt “social welfare” organizations from engaging in any overt political activity.
abstract: Representative Chris Van Hollen filed suit in Federal District Court to force the Internal Revenue Service to block tax-exempt “social welfare” organizations from engaging in any overt political activity.

headline.main: Senior House Democrat Sues I.R.S. Over Tax Exemptions
headline.print_headline: Senior House Democrat Sues I.R.S. Over Tax Exemptions
